overview: Alyah is a typical teenage girl who just received results SPMnya. He dreamed of connecting education to higher education, but because the thought of her mother, Peah, which still bucolic favoring boys, Alyah had to follow the will of his mother for help in their chicken stall at the market.  Andy is a young millionaire Rasputra from Bandung who lives in Malaysia. He was restless with life in Malaysia as he feels that everyone wants to be friends with him is because of his wealth.  One day Andy decided to pretend to be poor with the help of his former assistants, Mak Yam. Meanwhile, Kinah, a good friend told Alyah Alyah pretend to be rich so she stuck with her rich so his dream achieved.
title: Biar Mimpi Sampai Ke Bintang
